SELECT dci.id, dci.cno, dci.cname, dci.agno, dci.ctype, dci.captain, dci.mobile, dci.telno, dci.email, dci.qq, dci.resum, dci.incomes, dci.expends, dci.clubintr, dci.c_password, dci.activate_flag, dci.commnets, dci.add_time, dci.update_time, dci.isvalid, dci.logo, dci.version, dci.describe_message,dci.acac FROM darts_club_info as dci WHERE 1=1
AND dci.cname like concat('%', #{cname}, '%')
AND dci.cno like concat('%', #{cno}, '%')
AND dci.describe_message like concat('%', #{describe_message}, '%')
AND dci.update_time >= #{update_time_start}
AND dci.#{update_time_end} >= update_time
AND dci.isvalid = 1 ORDER BY dci.id DESC

SELECT dci.id, dci.cno, dci.cname, dci.agno, dci.ctype, dci.captain, dci.mobile, dci.telno, dci.email, dci.qq, dci.resum, dci.incomes, dci.expends, dci.clubintr, dci.c_password, dci.activate_flag, dci.commnets, dci.add_time, dci.update_time, dci.isvalid, dci.logo, dci.version, dci.describe_message,dci.acac FROM darts_club_info as dci WHERE (dci.agno is null or dci.agno = '')
AND dci.cname like concat('%', #{cname}, '%')
AND dci.cno like concat('%', #{cno}, '%')
AND dci.describe_message like concat('%', #{describe_message}, '%')
AND dci.update_time >= #{update_time_start}
AND dci.#{update_time_end} >= update_time
AND dci.isvalid = 1 ORDER BY dci.id DESC

SELECT dci.* FROM darts_club_info AS dci LEFT JOIN darts_agent_info AS dai ON dci.agno = dai.agno WHERE dai.isvalid = 1 AND dci.isvalid = 1
AND dai.agno = #{agno}
AND dci.cname like concat('%', #{cname}, '%')
AND dci.cno like concat('%', #{cno}, '%')
AND dci.describe_message like concat('%', #{describe_message}, '%')
ORDER BY dci.id DESC

SELECT dci.*, ( SELECT count(*) FROM darts_equ_auth AS dea1 LEFT JOIN darts_equ_info as dei on dei.equno = dea1.equno WHERE dea1.auth_no=dci.cno and dea1.auth_type = 1 and dei.isvalid = 1 ) as total, dcp.address FROM darts_club_info AS dci left join darts_club_place as dcp on dcp.cno=dci.cno WHERE dci.agno = #{agno} AND dci.isvalid = 1 ORDER BY dci.id DESC

SELECT dei.game_price, ( SELECT dci1.manage_game_price FROM darts_club_info AS dci1 LEFT JOIN darts_equ_auth AS dea1 ON dea1.auth_no = dci1.cno LEFT JOIN darts_equ_info AS dei1 ON dei1.equno = dea1.equno WHERE dci1.price_end_time >= NOW() AND NOW() >= dci1.price_start_time AND dei1.isvalid = 1 AND dea1.equno = #{equno} ) AS manage_game_price FROM darts_club_info AS dci LEFT JOIN darts_equ_auth AS dea ON dea.auth_no = dci.cno LEFT JOIN darts_equ_info AS dei ON dei.equno = dea.equno WHERE 1 = 1 AND dei.isvalid = 1 AND dea.equno = #{equno}
